name: Scroll of Secrets
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Scroll of Secrets and spend 1 secret: Look at the bottom card of any investigators's deck or the encounter deck. Then, either discard that card, add it to its owner's hand, place it on the bottom of its deck, or place it on the top of its deck.

name: Tennessee Sour Mash
text: Uses (2 supplies). [fast] Exhaust Tennessee Sour Mash and spend 1 supply: You get +2 [willpower] for a skill test on a teachery card. [action] Discard Tennessee Sour Mash: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack.

flavor:
We should have thrown it back immediately.
But how could we have known?
name: Grisly Totem
text: [reaction] After you commit a card to a skill test, exhaust Grisly Totem: That card gains another instance of one of its skill icons of your choice.
